text: The 2011 Horizon League Baseball Tournament took place from May 22–26, near the close of the 2011 NCAA Division I baseball season. The top six of the league's seven teams met in the double-elimination tournament held at Wright State's Nischwitz Stadium in Dayton, Ohio. Top seeded won their fourth Horizon League Championship and earned the conference's automatic bid to the 2011 NCAA Division I Baseball Tournament. ==Seeding== The league's six teams are seeded one through six based on winning percentage, using conference games only. {|class=wikitable ! Tanner was a third baseman for Wright State. ==References== Tournament Category:Horizon League Baseball Tournament Horizon League Baseball Category:Baseball in Ohio
